Posted By: Ichorix (2/23/2010 10:00:57 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Unlike what many others have said, Kird Ape is not restricted or banned or anything. It is completely legal. It got promoted to mythic because it used to be banned, then they changed their minds. By being a famous banned card, and becoming completely legal, it was reprinted as a mythic in From the Vaults. If they ever reprint this card in a normal set, it would not be mythic, probably an uncommon.
posts.html:
